attributes.action: All front line workers not to pay tax on their wages.
attributes.additional_details: To authorise that all key workers don't pay tax on their wages during the pandemic covid 19
attributes.background: Front line workers are running the risk of contracting covid 19. They can not self isolate like others and are working around the clock to keep us safe. From doctors nurses carers shop assistants lorry drivers police post men all key workers . Not to tax their pay.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
